Our Work

Energy Dashboard

Built using R and Shiny, this dashboard displays real-time energy production and consumption metrics for Peacock Hall on Appalachian State's Campus.

Check it out!
Affordable Housing

This visualization, purposed for use by policymakers, displays housing metrics and forecasts for the Charlotte area. We won the 2018 Charlotte Hackathon with this entry.

Check it out!
Mining Bee Data

This project reveals insights garnered via beekeeper hive management data. The linked presentation was presented to honeybee biologists in February 2018.

Check it out!
Altitude Analytics Consulting, LLC

Altitude Analytics Consulting, LLC is a company dedicated to creating knowledge from data. Combining our experience with data science and our client-oriented attitude, we assist businesses in fully leveraging the information that can be discovered from their data. Our solutions are tailored to each individual client's needs and provide them with actionable insights to better their business and the community.
